poem.title: Rasse
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Racks and ranks of creels Containing rats or civet cats of some kind.
Rafts of such repositories, Sampan towns of blocks of flats up there,
Where raffs of rain slant the streets And rhythm rants on windows.
Those syllabaries tethered in the cross-talk Ride at anchor. Metal rasps
As the ramps of ro-ro ferries Shut. The little creatures rax and yawn.
